channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Dr. Waiora Port, a respected academic and community leader, explores and reflects on the challenges and progress in the integration for M?ori heritage in NZ's health system. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Wai?rea delves into the experiences of a young Polynesian boy during the Dawn Raids in a compelling theater-driven narrative. Episode weaves real stories from Western Springs College students. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A polished, moving, and theatrical performance exploring migration, displacment, and identity. Wai?rea delivers one of the most dynamic haka theatre expressions in the series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: Drew reveals how gender and sexuality has been viewed differently by native people. He takes part in a drag show, meets two queer street performers, and visits a political force for trans-rights. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: The wh?nau set up a surprise birthday for their Nanny Del. Lead voice of Coco Reo M?ori, M?nuera, and his whanau perform at a screening of the movie. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: In Ahipara, the day prior to the Toit? te Tiriti march, M?nuera presents his assignment on Te Tiriti o Waitangi. And the wh?nau hit the road to Te Rerenga Wairua, to join the cause. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kaihoe
channel.desc: As important as the waka, are the kaihoe who will man it. We follow them as they prepare for this momentous occasion, starting with land training, involving learning haka, ngeri, and technique. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? W?hine
channel.desc: W?hine play a critical role in wh?nau, hap?, and iwi as whare tangata (procreators) and whare matauranga (repositories of knowledge) - but what role do they have in waka taua? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: NEW: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Pere Wihongi shares their journey and the state of M?ori music. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: M?kutu Mate M?ori. It is said negative thoughts are a powerful tool to activate M?kutu, and only Tohunga can remove it and prevent Mate M?ori from occurring. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Someday Stories
channel.desc: Flo's love for her new home is tested when her papa changes the menu at his traditional Chinese restaurant. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Our Other Islands
channel.desc: Troy is welcomed by a special wh?nau on K?piti island who are walking in the footsteps of their t?puna in a bid to restore the island. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?tea Kapa Haka
channel.desc: Featuring H?tea Kapa Haka, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: The crew go camping. Ma and Heps aren't talking, Taaps brings the wrong tent, Liz has finally made friends, and Pua brings her cat. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer and Here
channel.desc: Aniwa meets filmmaker Alesha Ahdar, who found healing through turning to film. He goes to Auckland's Pride Parade and meets up with some bears. Wait, what is a bear? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: End Of The Valley
channel.desc: When a land claim faces opposition, Kaea Williams is drawn into a world rich in heritage and mystery. The past and the present collide in unexpected ways. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Kid's on cloud nine but out of nowhere gets pushed down to Earth; an unlikely visitor makes Haki go the extra mile and Te Ururangi has no idea how to deal with school bullies. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Finding
channel.desc: A sheep farmer and his estranged teenage daughter attempt to rescue their frosty relationship during an unseasonal cold snap. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sista
channel.desc: A betrayal of trust between two sisters on the cusp of adolescence sets off a chain of events that has the potential to shatter their relationship forever. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to T?maki Makaurau to uncover the story behind the rock formation at Karekare beach called ?Te K?k?whakaara.? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After crashing down into a valley of lava streams, Kura is determined to find a way back up the cliff and get their godstick back from. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Life Wharekura
channel.desc: Follow reigning champions, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae, as they compete against other kura tuarua at Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024 in Whakat?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. It's the second w?nanga for Te N?tube Haka. Things are ramping up as they get into the poi and haka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tautohetohe
channel.desc: M?ori wordplay and wit in action as two teams go head-to-head on a given topic. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Digital Drum Studio Sessions
channel.desc: NEW: APTN?s Digital Drum Studio Sessions provide an up-close and personal look at some of today?s hottest Indigenous artists and the process they use to create their music.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Digital Drum Studio Sessions
channel.desc: NEW: APTN?s Digital Drum Studio Sessions provide an up-close and personal look at some of today?s hottest Indigenous artists and the process they use to create their music.

channel.title: Our Other Islands
channel.desc: Troy is welcomed by a special wh?nau on K?piti island who are walking in the footsteps of their t?puna in a bid to restore the island. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer And Here Series 2
channel.desc: Awa explores the role family plays within the queer community. Examining what that looks like for our wh?nau and consider how important it is to find your tribe in order to thrive. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Out There
channel.desc: Driven by a quest for self-understanding, filmmaker Alexis Smith joins a secret network dedicated to contac􀆟ng extraterrestrial life. When she encounters something that pushes her to the edge of belief, it's her own sense of aliena􀆟on that she must learn to accept. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Moana
channel.desc: Beneath the water, a toxic algae silently spreads, suffocating the lifeforce of the seafloor, its reach a creeping shadow over Aotearoa's ocean depths. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Kid's on cloud nine but out of nowhere gets pushed down to Earth; an unlikely visitor makes Haki go the extra mile and Te Ururangi has no idea how to deal with school bullies. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Simonne Butler shares critical insights into the relationship that changed her life forever. A relationship where she nearly lost her life at the hands of another. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: NZ Police Detective Jaimie-Leigh shares her story of trauma to inspire that one?s past need not define their future, and dreams can come true. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Jacques found himself couch surfing after life at home became intolerable. With the right support, he is turning his life around. (R).

channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. While living on the streets Wiremu weighed a massive 280kgs, was an addict, and about to die. All that changed when he met Linda. (R).

channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: Liz tries to impress her whanau by singing at karaoke, but this only makes her feel like more of an outsider. A sympathetic Taaps helps her learn a waiata to sing at Aunty Bella's party. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: Indonesian Cinzia Jonathan has been learning the M?ori language so she and her husband Mike can raise their daughter in Te Reo M?ori.

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: A cultural trailblazer, Hone Tuwhare was one of New Zealand's most celebrated poets and one of the first M?ori to gain prominence in English-language literature. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura is in Taranaki visiting the internationally famous Roebuck Farms, Chef Landon Elder and expert coffee roasters Proof and Stock. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Hokinga Mai - The Return
channel.desc: The journey of M?ori reconnecting with their whakapapa and whenua. In the small coastal Hawkes Bay settlement of Waimarama people are returning home. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Frontier
channel.desc: Mexican-owned Texas offers land and freedom for white settlers, but the influx of 'Americans' would spark the brutal Mexican-American war that would change the course of US history forever. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: NEW: Waitangi is a big week for the wh?nau, doing mahi to support the kaupapa but also taking time to enjoy the festivities. They meet Hana-R?whiti Maipi-Clarke and Eru Kapa-Kingi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moonlight
channel.desc: PREMIERE: A young African-American man grapples with identity and sexuality while growing up in a rough Miami neighborhood.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.title: T?hura

channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. Te N?tube Haka is made up of performers from different regions. We see how practicing separately will go down. (R).

channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai confides in Mihi. Wai?s mum sends the girls to the creek to check the eel pots. The farmers leave for the feast with a cart packed with freshly baked bread. (R).

channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: The children play by the creek to cool down on a warm day. They enjoy games with the fairy people of the forest. Wai is happy to take their time. Wai hears laughter and goes to check it out. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: With danger averted, Josh plays along with Kura, Rangi and Toro and decides to help them look for the stolen godstick. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Tired of this weird game, Josh decides it's time to go home but is soon running for his life from creatures emerging from a strange bone-lined fort. (R).

channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara

channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara

channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Tessa, a PHD student is researching ways to revitalise Toheroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: A new mum grapples with the possibility that her baby is neurodiverse. Nathan explains that it's a subtle art of looking at patterns of behaviour and seeing if there's enough to warrant diagnosis. (R).

channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit, Anelekai Adventures, and Dive Tatapouri. (R).

channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).
